description.value:
Recipe Price 50 sp
Ingredients 6 basic, 2 special
Preparation DC 18 Cooking Lore, DC 20 Survival
Requirements Basic Kitchen plus Magical or Alchemical Crafting OR Magic Kitchen
Favorite Meal For the duration of the meal, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic} as an innate 1st-rank spell.

Auric parmigiana is pasta that is boiled, then pan-fried and tossed with sliced vegetables and a sticky, savory tomato sauce incorporating alchemical reagents, layered with cheese, coming in both eggplant and chicken flavors.

After you eat the noodles, they boost your ability to sense magic for 24 hours or until you make your next daily preparations, whichever comes first. You gain a +1 item bonus to checks to Identify Magic or increase any existing item bonuses to Identify Magic. You can also move at full speed while using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Yb0C1uLzeHrVLl7a]{Detect Magic} exploration activity.

@UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.equipment.Item.KXezxpaImgYoXmrk]{Effect: Auric Parmigiana}
